name: Savjetodavna služba (Advisory Service Croatia)
goal:
The development of competitive and advanced farms and entities in fisheries using information, advisory and education, while following the principle of good agricultural practice, and the preservation of rural areas, fostering tradition and customs.
Goals:
Increased competitiveness of farms
More effective use of national and EU funds
Conducting annual FADN surveys
Expert supervision of integrated production
Professional education and training of farms and entities in fisheries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Education, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives: Legal basis for implementation of advisory system is article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1305/2013 on support for RD by the European Agricultural Fund for Rural Development (EAFRD), Implementation of Measure M01: Knowledge transfer and information actions and Measure M02: Advisory Service, service for management of farms and help for farms and professional assitance in other RDP 2014-2020 measures, Implementation of the system of agricultural accountancy data by annual surveys (FADN)
